body:
Just tried latest patch: "HEAD is now at 6632631... runtime: bound scanobject to ~100 Âµs"

client side max jumped after a few seconds from 2ms to 52ms:
(two susbequent lines of client log)
min: 0.464200 | avg: 0.867400 | max: 2.005700
min: 0.464200 | avg: 0.870495 | max: 52.144300

server printed this line:
gc 21 @28.678s 1%: 1.0+108+0 ms clock, 4.0+0/53/54+0 ms cpu, 344->344->187 MB, 374 MB goal, 4 P

You can find attached gctrace file
[gctrace_with_patch_2.txt](https://github.com/golang/go/files/287592/gctrace_with_patch_2.txt)

Regarding my source, I was only suggesting to look at the code. I don't mind testing your patches, as this is a very important task for me

Thank you
